          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A polgári Magyarország születése</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Birth Of Civil Hungary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Geburt Von Zivilungarn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Naissance de la Hongrie Civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Nascimento De Hungria Civil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Nascita Dell'Ungheria Civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γέννηση της αστικής Ουγγαρίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Nacimiento De Hungría Civil</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A pesti forradalom, az áprilisi törvények és a nemzetiségi kérdés</string>
            <string language="en-US">The revolution of Budapest, the April laws and the nationality question</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Hungarian parliament in Bratislava</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Hungarian bourgeoisie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">responsible ministry in Hungary</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Umdrehung von Budapest, die April Gesetze und
die Nationalität Frage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La révolution de Budapest, les lois d'avril et la 
question de nationalité</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A volta de Budapest, as leis de abril e a pergunta 
da nacionalidade</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rivoluzione di Budapest, le leggi di aprile e la 
domanda di nazionalità</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επανάσταση της Βουδαπέστης, οι νόμοι Απριλίου και η 
ερώτηση υπηκοότητας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La revolución de Budapest, los leyes de abril y la
pregunta de la nacionalidad</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ungarisches Bürgertum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verantwortliches Ministerium in Ungarn</string>
          </keyword>
